    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server
    Interfaces for server-side resource rendering

    • Uses of HalResponseRendererBuilder in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server that return HalResponseRendererBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.create() 
      HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.withAnnotationTypeSupport(HalApiAnnotationSupport additionalTypeSupport)
      Extend the core framework to support additional annotation types in your annotated HAL API interfaces.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.withExceptionStrategy(ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy customStrategy)
      Allow the exception handling of the core framework to support additional platform / framework specific exceptions.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.withMetrics(RequestMetricsCollector metricsSharedWithClient)
      Provide the RequestMetricsCollector instance that was used to capture and measure all interaction with the HalApiClient for the current incoming request.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.withReturnTypeSupport(HalApiReturnTypeSupport additionalTypeSupport)
      Extend the core framework to support additional return types in your annotated HAL API interfaces.
      HalResponseRendererBuilder HalResponseRendererBuilder.withRhymeDocsSupport(RhymeDocsSupport rhymeDocsSupport)
      Enable generation of "curies" links (to HTML documentation generated with the rhyme-docs-maven-plugin) when rendering HalResponses with Rhyme.renderResponse(LinkableResource).
